name: Starvation (JoeSlager)
description:
Use the day to prepare for the night

Gather resources and explore the forest. However,  beware of the night as they will come...don't let your fire go out...

I am building this for a school assessment task. I am uploading this in the hope to receive feedback as I still need to make minor tweaks prior to handing it in. If you find any bugs, issues or have any recommendations please comment below

Starvation Guide:

https://sites.google.com/education.nsw.gov.au/starvation-guide/home
